products.title: Splash Mocha Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash mocha brown is a chic medium brown vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this brown vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
